attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: dear sir i have been a labour fan for years i would like you to help people like me as i have tryed to get a new house because i have three boys in a small room ages 19,12,6 i have a morgage on my house i got money to put down as a deposit but my credit file is bad so no bank will help us all i want is to make life better for my kids i would like you to look at credit files. i have payed most of my debts off but still carnt get help please can you help
